item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 褶皱的： shaped into a series of regular folds that look like waves
【例】 corrugated paper 褶皱的纸
【近】 wrinkled['rɪŋkld], creased, folded
【反】 smooth 光滑的
【派】 corrugation n. 褶皱，折痕
